SELECT RNUM, CLASS_NUMBER, CLASS_TITLE, TO_CHAR(CLASS_START_DATE, 'YYYY". "MM". "DD') AS CLASS_START_DATE, TO_CHAR(CLASS_END_DATE, 'YYYY". "MM". "DD') AS CLASS_END_DATE, CLASS_PROCESS, CLASS_PRICE, CLASS_ADDRESS, CLASS_LEVEL, USER_NUMBER, USER_NAME, USER_LEVEL, APPLY_EDUCATION FROM (SELECT ROWNUM AS RNUM, CB.CLASS_NUMBER, CB.CLASS_TITLE, CB.CLASS_START_DATE, CB.CLASS_END_DATE, CB.CLASS_PROCESS, CB.CLASS_PRICE, CB.CLASS_ADDRESS, CB.CLASS_LEVEL, CB.USER_NUMBER, U.USER_NAME, U.USER_LEVEL, MA.APPLY_EDUCATION FROM TBL_CLASS_BOARD CB JOIN TBL_USERS U ON CB.USER_NUMBER = U.USER_NUMBER LEFT JOIN TBL_MEMTO_APPLY MA ON U.USER_NUMBER = MA.USER_NUMBER WHERE CLASS_TITLE LIKE '%' || #{searchValue} || '%' AND ROWNUM <= #{page} * #{amount} and class_level = '2' ) WHERE RNUM > (#{page} - 1) * #{amount}
